abstracts.cdata!:
The project consists of the expansion of
            USIMINAS's production facilities from about 1.0 to 2.4
            million metric tons of raw steel per year to produce about
            1.85 million tons of flat rolled products. The new
            facilities will include a battery of coke ovens, sintering
            plant, a blast furnace, a new basic oxygen plant and
            additions to the existing basic oxygen plant, two continuous
            slabcasting machines, additions to the existing slabbing
            mill, a heavy plate mill, additions to the existing hot
            strip mill, a hot skin pass line, a pickling line, a tandem
            cold strip mill, annealing furnaces and ancillary equipment.
